1442.name: SA 309L
1442.Applications: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or difficult to weld steels.
1442.Suitable_For: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or difficult to weld steels such as: 42CrMo4, C45, 42MnV7, tool steels. High temperature steels such as: 22NiMoCr4-7, 20MnMoNi5-5 and GS-18NiMoCr3-7
